amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Attorney General to originate or join in any lawsuit that seeks to overturn, enjoin, or invalidate Immigration Enforcement Laws in Oklahoma, Missouri, Arizona, Utah, Indiana, Alabama, South Carolina, and Georgia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Attorney General to originate or join in any lawsuit that seeks to overturn, enjoin, or invalidate Immigration Enforcement Laws in Oklahoma, Missouri, Arizona, Utah, Indiana, Alabama, South Carolina, and Georgia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 173 (Roll no. 220).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Black amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 173 (Roll no. 220).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mrs. Black.
